name: Squares VS Triangles
description:
This game developed for the (Brackeys Game Jam 2022) the theme of jam is "It is not real" so i made a game like a war between (Triangles and Squares) and we have many In-game secrets

you can know the secrets by download the game and play it

Note : Look at The screenshots to know how the game look

 ---------------------------------------------------------

Control :  MoveUp : W, UpArrow MoveDown : S, DownArrow MoveRight : D, RightArrow MoveLeft : A, LeftArrow the player look to the mouse all the time   you can shoot by clicking : Z, Mouse0(Left mouse button)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

I know the game is not perfect but its good

please if you download the game complete it to the end 

I got fun in this GameJam and thank you..
